name: plusminus
description:
FAT or Skinny

Today’s dining is all about Self-Control.

The plus minus introduces both a simple and inexpensive solution to lower the diner’s stress while eating and helping them to attain better health.

Each bowl and dish provides two different portions, a small portion on one side or flip the bowl for a regular portion on the other side.

With the bowls, it is okay to fill up the bowl on any side any time.

—
White, Ceramic

—
H 13 x W 10.5_stack(+)
H 7.5 x W 10.5_stack(-)

name: licht_ (short ver.)
description:
About
Licht is a new light.

(Light’s Silhouette)

Licht (light in German) celebrates the fusion of high-design with low-tech manufacturing. The design process began with the investigation of processes in local boutique manufacturers.

Licht interprets the structure of a lamp through the silhouette of the light.

It’s about light.
It’s about simplicity.
It’s about effortless.

—
Galvanized wire 
Red-orange, Black

—
H 46 x W 23.5_tall – $195
H 21.5 x W 11_short – $175

For more information,

please email : info@sookwon.com
or visit a website : http://www.sookwon.com
